This page lists the tools provided by LADAL. To access a tool, simply click on the ![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg) badge or on the linked name of the tool, and the tool (an interactive Jupyter notebook) will launch, allowing you to perform the task.


# Overview {-}


| Tool | Content | Launch Tool  | 
|------------|--------------------------------|--------|
|[Concordancing Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fkwictool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Allows users to create **K**ey**w**ord-**i**n-**C**ontext displays of words or phrases in a single text or collection of texts and to download the resulting table.| [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fkwictool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain)|
|[Collocation Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Famtool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tool that <b>calculates various association measures</b> (collocation statistics) based on textual input and allows users to download the resulting table. |[![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Famtool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain)|
|[Keyword Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fkeytool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tool that calculates various <b>keyness measures</b>  based on textual input and allows users to download the resulting table. | [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fkeytool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain)|
|[Pos-tagging Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fpostool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tools that allows users to add **p**art-**o**f-**s**peech tags to texts or collections of texts in more than 60 languages and allows users to download the resulting pos-tagged texts. | [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fpostool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) |
|[Corpus-cleaning Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fstringtool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tool that allows users to <b>remove and replace</b> words, tags, and other elements from the text data that you upload (of course you can then download the cleaned texts too). | [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fstringtool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) |
|[Network-Analysis Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fnettool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tool that allows users to generate and download <b>network graphs</b> based on their own data. | [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fnettool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) |
|[Topic-Model Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Ftopictool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tool that allows users to generate their own <b>custom topic models</b> using unsupervised and supervised LDA and download the results in an MS Excel spreadsheet.  | [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Ftopictool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) |
|[Sentiment-Analysis Tool](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fsentool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) | Tool that allows users to perform a <b>sentiment analysis</b> and download the results in an MS Excel spreadsheet.  | [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://binderhub.atap-binder.cloud.edu.au/v2/gh/SLCLADAL/interactive-notebooks-environment/main?urlpath=git-pull%3Frepo%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fgithub.com%252FSLCLADAL%252Finteractive-notebooks%26urlpath%3Dlab%252Ftree%252Finteractive-notebooks%252Fnotebooks%252Fsentool.ipynb%26branch%3Dmain) |

# Reporting Errors {-}

If something's amiss or if a tool isn't cooperating, don't hesitate to contact Martin at **m.schweinberger@uq.edu.au**. We'll do our best to investigate and resolve the issue as quickly as we can. Thanks for bringing it to our attention!
